PageTitle: Collaborative document editing for Plone | ONLYOFFICE Docs
PageDescription: Edit and co-author your documents, create and fill out forms within Plone
Subheader: Work on all kinds of office documents within Plone CMS
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Plone
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE connector for Plone now from <0>PyPi.org</0> and the ONLYOFFICE <1>GitHub page</1>.
Reason1: Full support for <0>all popular formats</0>, including OOXML and ODF.
Reason2: Complete set of formatting and styling tools organized into an <0>intuitive tabbed interface</0>.
Reason3: <0>Real-time co-editing</0>, chat and comments, track changes and version history, document comparison.
Reason4: <0>Flawless display of content</0> regardless of browser and operating system.
Reason5: <0>Easy configuration</0> from the Plone admin console.
HowToStartStep1: Nasaďte <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> na svůj vlastní server nebo se zaregistrujte do <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2: Download the latest connector version from <0>PyPi.org</0> and the ONLYOFFICE <1>GitHub page</1>.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Potřebujete aplikaci pro propojení ONLYOFFICE Docs s vaší oblíbenou webovou službou? Nebo jste již nějakou vyvinuli?
